content: emilee dee mitts by paula mckeever snapper knits a k w m c e s w o e a p i p l l t k o d o t i s n r r o k t g i w f n w e f y d i o e c o t u i h e u g l e i d r n h h t w b a e e o n i y o d th g a d s e r r s w e n r a a o t r d r m f t k o h j u r i e n s s t a o e r materials for dk weight pattern notes 50 grams/126 yards size 4 3 50 mm needles instructions are provided both in written gauge 6 sts=1 inch form and in charts size modification can be done by for sportweight adjusting the needle size or adding a 52 grams/ 120 yards pattern repeat of 8 stitches size 2 3 00 mm needles almost all 50 grams of dk yarn were gauge 7 sts = 1 inch used to make up the mitts as written if any changes are made the amount stitch markers needed may differ scrap yarn or stitch holder changes for using sportweight yarn are in tapestry needle parentheses instructions instructions are given for dk weight changes for sportweight are in parentheses cast on 40 48 sts and join in the round work in k2p2 ribbing for 6 rounds work 1 repeat of pattern chart 1 chart 1 turtle tracks lace pattern key for charts 1&2 make 1 ssk no stitch k2tog yo knit purl turtle tracks lace pattern worked over 8 sts row 1-3 and all odd row *k6 p2 repeat from * row 4 * yo k2 ssk k2 p2 repeat from * row 6 * k1 yo k2 ssk k1 p2 repeat from * row 8 * k2 yo k2 ssk p2 repeat from * row 10 * k6 p2 repeat from * row 12 * k2 k2tog k2 yo p2 repeat from * row 14 * k1 k2tog k2 yo k1 p2 repeat from * row 16 * k2tog k2 yo k2 p2 repeat from * gusset begin pattern chart 2 and thumb gusset increases m1r = bring the tip of the left-hand needle under the strand between stitches from back to front knit this loop m1l = bring the tip of the left-hand needle under the strand between stitches from front to back knit through the back of the loop round 1 work pattern as established row 1 of pattern round 2 knit in turtle tracks lace pattern row 2 of pattern for 15 stitches pm m1 pm knit remaining stitches of round in turtle tracks lace pattern as established 1 stitch between markers round 3-4 knit in pattern to marker sm k1 sm work remaining stitches in pattern round 5 knit in pattern row 5 of
